from db_config import Base

class Todo(Base):
    __tablename__ = "todos"
    id = Column(Integer, primary_key=True, index=True)
    title = Column(String, nullable=False)
    description = Column(String, nullable=True)
    completed = Column(Boolean, default=False)

    title: str | None = None
    description: str | None = None
    completed: bool | None = None

class TodoRead(TodoBase):
    id: int
    completed: bool

    class Config:

Next, let's create a backend test file to verify the database setup and ensure the todos table is created and accessible.

<action type="todo_update" id="test_setup" status="in_progress"/>

<action type="file" filePath="backend/test_todo_setup.py">
from db_config import Base, engine, get_db
from database.todo import Todo
from sqlalchemy.orm import Session

def test_create_tables():
    print("Creating all tables...")
    Base.metadata.create_all(bind=engine)
    print("Tables created.")

def test_db_insert_and_query():
    db: Session = next(get_db())
    print("Inserting test todo...")
    todo = Todo(title="Test Todo", description="Setup test", completed=False)
    db.add(todo)
    db.commit()
    db.refresh(todo)
    print("Inserted todo ID:", todo.id)
    print("Querying todos...")
    todos = db.query(Todo).all()
    print("Todos found:", [t.title for t in todos])
    assert any(t.title == "Test Todo" for t in todos)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    test_create_tables()
    test_db_insert_and_query()
    print("Todo setup test passed.")
</action>

import os
import requests
from dotenv import load_dotenv

load_dotenv()
BASE = os.environ.get('BACKEND_URL', 'http://localhost:8001')

def test_create_todo():
    print("POST /todos/")
    r = requests.post(f"{BASE}/todos/", json={"title": "API Test", "description": "Created via API"})
    print(r.status_code, r.json())
    assert r.status_code == 201
    return r.json()["id"]

def test_list_todos():
    print("GET /todos/")
    r = requests.get(f"{BASE}/todos/")
    print(r.status_code, r.json())
    assert r.status_code == 200
    return r.json()

def test_update_todo(todo_id):
    print(f"PUT /todos/{todo_id}/")
    r = requests.put(f"{BASE}/todos/{todo_id}/", json={"completed": True})
    print(r.status_code, r.json())
    assert r.status_code == 200
    assert r.json()["completed"] is True

def test_delete_todo(todo_id):
    print(f"DELETE /todos/{todo_id}/")
    r = requests.delete(f"{BASE}/todos/{todo_id}/")
    print(r.status_code)
    assert r.status_code == 204

if __name__ == "__main__":
    todo_id = test_create_todo()
    todos = test_list_todos()
    test_update_todo(todo_id)
    test_delete_todo(todo_id)
    print("All API endpoint tests passed.")
</action>
